alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 7:35PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Douglas County through 800 PM CDT... At 734 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Evansville, or 17 miles west of Alexandria, moving northeast at 25 mph. Public reported a funnel cloud with this thunderstorm. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Evansville around 745 PM CDT. Brandon around 750 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 82 and 94. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
